挑有力度的翻译，特别是政府不作为现象，不要翻译吐嘈的。

中国悲剧是因为专制，日本悲剧是因为人民不珍惜民主。
The tragedy in China is because of the autocracy, and the tragedy in Japan is because the people do not care about democracy.
[url=https://twitter.com/ppsh41_1945/status/1231401540323119105][/url]
https://twitter.com/ppsh41_1945/status/1231401540323119105
[Novel Coronavirus Measures Budget]
Hong Kong Autonomous Government: 350 billion yen
Singapore: 500 billion yen
Japan: 15 billion yen

[Number of Novel Coronavirus Tests]
South Korea: 16,000 or more
Japan: About 800

The Japanese government will not prevent the spread of new pneumonia.
In addition, Abe has been spending time on dinners without opening a Novel Coronavirus Task Force in recent days.


https://twitter.com/uPEMpjqvTu7tHhF/status/1230241223668948992
My doctor requested a health center to test for coronavirus, but the test was rejected.
They said that I can consult again when it becomes more serious

I don't know if I'm infected


https://twitter.com/xDAgk64zFgjXXeN/status/1230778648858218501
A friend from me just contacted me
Throat hurts for days with high fever
He was told that it was not influenza as a result of the test, and he said he wanted to have a coronavirus test, but he was replied that he could not do it because he had no travel history
Osaka city!
It's a provincial city but people are living there!
The city that people do not get tested is proud of having only one infected person!


https://twitter.com/ito_senpai1/status/1231054312282849280
At present, the health center does not test coronavirus.

Out of 13,900 telephone consultations, only 500 were connected to specialized outpatient departments. Furthermore, many people are refused even if they go there.

Roche's genetic test kits have been put into practical use, but since the Ministry of Health, Labor and Welfare has budgeted for its own development, it has been resolutely rejected to be used.

A nightmare.


https://twitter.com/Emi333333333332/status/1230846889559375872
Elder son with pneumonia, fever and cough at 6th day

In conclusion, despite the strong desire for coronavirus testing today, doctors and health centers stubbornly rejected it

The reason is he doesn't belong to the inspection subjects

The current inspection subjects are
Have history of travel or contact with positive patients
Persons who have severe pneumonia judged by doctors (to be continued)


https://twitter.com/mai18656538/status/1231370422228148224
I have a cold since 1 week ago, I keep coughing since 4 days ago, and I have fever of 38 ° C since yesterday. As a result of inquiry, I cannot have coronavirus test. The obstetrics and gynecology doctor also protested that the response was strange, but it was no use. My breathing is getting more and more difficult. Can I just die with the fetus?


https://twitter.com/KusumiEiji/status/1231405107356430338
"My friend wrote a case report on coronavirus, it seemed that he couldn't publish it because of pressure from the hospital executives, because patients wouldn't come."

The precious opportunity to learn from cases has been lost.

To prevent this from happening, it is advisable to spread the test and visualize positions of infected people.
